Package org.radarbase.management.security.jwt

Class ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.radarbase.management.security.jwt.ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler
  • @Component
public class ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Similar to Spring's KeyStoreKeyFactory. However this class does not assume a specific key type, while the Spring factory assumes RSA keys.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler​(org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment, javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext, ManagementPortalProperties managementPortalProperties)
      Keystore factory.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler

        @Autowired
public ManagementPortalOauthKeyStoreHandler​(org.springframework.core.env.Environment environment,
                                            javax.servlet.ServletContext servletContext,
                                            ManagementPortalProperties managementPortalProperties)
        Keystore factory. This tries to load the first valid keystore listed in resources.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if none of the provided resources can be used to load a keystore.
